channel.title: vpn on i-py.com
channel.description: Recent content in vpn on i-py.com

item.title: Meraki VPN Deployment Part Final
item.description: So here we go. A finalized script that will create the VPN profile, as necessary, for Meraki VPN deployment. This should enable complete deployment of a Meraki VPN profile to clients, using just PowerShell 4.0 and enable split tunneling.

item.title: Meraki VPN Deployment Part 2
item.description: Well, humble pie time. But this is good stuff here. Turns out I missed one little teeny tiny flag in the Add-VpnConnection cmdlet. Oops. But this is good!

item.title: Meraki VPN Deployment
item.description: Grumble. We’re in the process of replacing our infrastructure with Meraki products - in fact, we’ve been extremely pleased with this so far. Except for that one thing. Deploying the Client VPN sucks.

item.title: Connecting Ubiquiti EdgeRouter to AWS VPC
item.description: I’m of the mind that many small businesses can benefit greatly from extending their IT systems into the cloud. AWS is price effective (especially on a 1 year reserved term), and offers built-in VPN connectivity options via their VPC.
